lines.text: Do you know who I am?
What you were in the Southwest, I was in the Northwest.
I was mostly out of work.

[referring to the witnesses at his hanging]
Sam, I never did see such a pasty-faced bunch of marshals.

Someday, you're going to have to pay for your way of life, Tom. You're a bad man and I know it. And if I let you talk me out of it, I'll be lost forever. So my adventures in this life won't mean anything because you will have seduced my soul...and drawn me into your world. Goodbye, Tom.
Keep your nerve Sam, 'cause I'm gonna keep mine.
Listen, why are you hangin' around with me?
Because you are a link to the Old West.
If you really knew how dirty and raggedy-assed the Old West was, you wouldn't want any part of it.
Did you get the letter that is telling you to not come around here?
I got your fucking letter, champion! I rolled it up in the back with tobacco and smoked it!
Did you get the note telling you to not come around here?
I got your fucking note! I rolled it up in the back with tobacco and smoked it!
